mapper.insert: INSERT INTO no1.orderStatusHistory (ord_id, bef_ord_stus_code, curr_ord_stus_code, chg_stus_reason, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id) VALUES (#{ordId}, #{befOrdStusCode}, #{currOrdStusCode}, #{chgStusReason}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{regId}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{upId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM no1.orderStatusHistory JOIN no1.order ON no1.orderStatusHistory.ord_id = no1.order.ord_id WHERE no1.order.cust_id = #{custId} ORDER BY orderStatusHistory.up_date
